document_data.name: Clan Undurr
document_data.mainbody: '''Clan Undurr''' was one of the [[dwarven]] clans from the [[Deep Realm]] of the [[Great Rift]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The family dwelled primarily in the city of [[Glitterdelve]].
document_data.Members: * [[Barrowin Undurr]], a [[cleric]] of [[Gorm Gulthyn]]{{cite web | author= [[Wizards of the Coast]]  | title=Barrowin Undurr | publisher=[[Wizards of the Coast]] | date=2014 | work=What is D&D? |  url=http://dnd.wizards.com/dungeons-and-dragons/what-dd/heroes/barrowin | accessdate=2015-02-10}} and noted adventurer of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite web/Tyranny of Dragons: Online Comic 9}}{{Cite web/Tyranny of Dragons: Online Comic 10}}
